meanings.sent1: The inaneness of the conversation left everyone feeling uninterested.
meanings.sent2: The inaneness of the task made it hard to stay focused.
meanings.sent3: The inaneness of the situation was like watching paint dry.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes reflected the inaneness of the room, devoid of any excitement.
meanings.sent5: The inaneness of the lecture made it difficult to stay awake.

meanings.definition: The quality of being empty or void.
meanings.sent1: The inaneness of the room was eerie in the darkness.
meanings.sent2: The inaneness of the box made it clear it was empty.
meanings.sent3: The inaneness of the hallway echoed with each step.
meanings.sent4: His words fell into the inaneness of the vast desert.
meanings.sent5: The inaneness of the abandoned house sent shivers down her spine.

meanings.sent1: The inaneness of the movie made her yawn repeatedly.
meanings.sent2: The inaneness of the meeting seemed to drag on forever.
meanings.sent3: The inaneness of the party made her wish she stayed home.
meanings.sent4: His jokes were met with an inaneness that dampened the mood.
meanings.sent5: The inaneness of the rainy day matched her melancholy mood.
